features: SURE-CRISP AIR FRY FUNCTION POWERFULLY CIRCULATES AIR AROUND FOOD FOR CRISPY RESULTS. The Sure-Crisp air fry function* provides crisp, even browning with little to no oil, making it ideal for air frying chicken, French fries, steak, fish and more.

6 VERSATILE SETTINGS FOR MULTI-FUNCTIONAL COOKING. Go from air frying chicken wings on Monday to baking brownies on Sunday. The air fry, bake, broil, toast, bagel and keep warm settings of this air fryer toaster oven provide maximum cooking versatility.

COMPACT SIZE SAVES COUNTER SPACE: While this toaster oven air fryer takes up minimal space, it provides the functionality of a full-size oven. The nonstick interior fits 4 slices of bread, a 10” pizza or 9” x 9” bake pan and has 2 rack positions.

TOASTER OVEN AIR FRYER COMBO WITH EXCELLENT COOKING PERFORMANCE. Quality quartz heating elements, 1500 watts and powerful convection fan provide precise, accurate temperatures from 200 to 450° F and result in even cooking without hot spots.

PREMIUM DIGITAL CONTROLS FOR PRECISE COOKING. The intuitive control panel with LCD screen displays which setting you selected, how many minutes are left on the timer and the oven’s temperature. When the cooking time is up, the oven shuts off.
*Air fry function may require more cooking time than standalone air fryers.
body.description: The Hamilton BeachProfessional Sure-CrispAir Fry Digital Toaster Oven powerfully circulates air around food for delicious, crispy results. Six versatile settings provide multi-functional cooking and the compact size is perfect in every kitchen.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerfully Circulates Air Around Food for Crispy Results Go from air frying crispy chicken wings on Monday to baking brownies on Sunday. The air fry, bake, broil, toast, bagel and keep warm settings provide maximum cooking versatility.

Inspired by our 100 years of experience designing products used in commercial kitchens, Hamilton Beach Professional is a line of countertop kitchen appliances with professional-level components designed to deliver exceptional performance and superior durability for the serious home cook. Hamilton Beach Professional Sure-Crisp Air Fry Digital Toaster Oven The excellent air fry, baking and toasting performance of this professional-quality toaster oven demands room on your counter. The Hamilton Beach Professional Sure-Crisp Air Fry Digital Toaster Oven lets you expertly prepare everything from crispy chicken wings to filet mignon, but unlike your main oven, it won't heat up the whole kitchen. The compact size takes up minimal space on your counter and it fits 4 slices of bread, a 10” pizza or 9” x 9” bake pan. The premium digital controls and quartz heating elements provide precise temperatures and even heating without hot spots. 6 versatile settings including air fry, bake, broil, toast, bagel and keep warm Nonstick interior and slide-out crumb tray for easy cleanup Premium digital controls for precise cooking Includes a mesh air fry basket, bake pan, broil rack, removable oven rack and removable crumb tray Stylish, durable stainless steel construction

6 Versatile Settings for Multi-Functional Cooking Quality quartz heating elements, 1500 watts and a powerful convection fan provide precise, accurate temperatures from 200 to 450° F and result in even cooking without hot spots.

Features: Sure-Crisp Air Fry Function Powerfully Circulates Air Around Food for Crispy Results The Sure-Crisp air fry function* provides crisp, even browning with little to no oil, making it ideal for air frying chicken, French fries, steak, fish, vegetables and more. *Air fry function may require more cooking time than standalone air fryers. Compact Size Saves Counter Space While this compact toaster oven takes up minimal space, it provides the functionality of a full-size oven. The nonstick interior fits 4 slices of bread, a 10” pizza or 9” x 9” bake pan and has 2 rack positions to accommodate a variety of cooking needs. Premium Digital Controls for Precise Cooking The intuitive digital control panel with LCD screen displays which setting you selected, how many minutes are left on the timer, and the oven’s temperature in your choice of Fahrenheit or Celsius. When the cooking time is up, the oven shuts off automatically. Includes 5 Accessories This oven includes a mesh air fry basket, bake pan, broil rack, removable oven rack and removable crumb tray. The mesh basket lets air circulate around food for even browning.

4-Slice Easy Reach Toaster Oven Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Countertop Toaster Oven Air Fryer Countertop Toaster Oven with Quantum Technology Hamilton Beach Professional Sure-Crisp Air Fry Digital Countertop Toaster Oven Size 4-Slice 4-Slice 6-Slice 6-Slice Air Fry ✓ Quantum Convection Technology ✓ Wattage 1200 1120 1400 1500 Other Easy Reach Door

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great when the oven goes!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this when our oven died and it was going to be 3 weeks before the new was delivered. This is great short term substitute! Toasted bread, air fried veggies, even "baked" some chicken. It's attractive and doesn't take up a ton of room on the counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t cook at all but finally broke down and bought this. It has a smaller footprint than the newer model which mattered more to me. I use it to toast bagels, roast broccoli, and air fry tofu. It heats up quickly, and everything tastes great. It does take about double the time to cook as a standard air fryer, but I love having a large flat basket to use. It’s easy to fit a lot in 1 layer and honestly the difference between 8 min and 16 min doesn’t mean much to me. I’m just happy at how quickly it preheats and how simple it is to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's okay. Seems dependable
reviews.reviewText: The oven and broil features are nice. You can fit a full size pie plate inside. But the toast function is really flawed. I've adjusted it up and down and it just isn't dependable. I guess if you have an actual toaster this would be a nice little unit but I have a tiny kitchen and probably should have sprung for a higher end device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact - very small footprint on the counter
reviews.reviewText: Nice toaster oven for daily use for my wife and I with easy to use controls and display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hamilton Beach Professional Sure-Crisp Digital Toaster Oven AirFryer Combo
reviews.reviewText: Although this oven size was what I needed to fit the space, the interior size was two inches smaller than my previous oven. It would be helpful if the interior size could be stated in the description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took a little getting used to, but works great and is easy to use once you get used to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
reviews.reviewText: Smaller than our old one but sufficient for our needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Versatile, easy to use, simple controls, perfect size. I recommend this oven.
